code: import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{GlobalContext}from'../context/GlobalState';import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddTransection(){const{addTrasnsection}=useContext(GlobalContext);const[text,setText]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState(0);function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();if(amount===0||text===''){return;}const newTransection={id:Math.trunc(Math.random()*10000),text,amount:Number(amount)};addTrasnsection(newTransection);setAmount(0);setText('');}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Add new transaction"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{action:"submit",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-control",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"text",children:"Text"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter Text.....",value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-control",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{htmlFor:"amount",children:["Amount ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),"(Negative = Expense, Postive = Income)"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter Amount...."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",children:"Add Transection"})]})]});}export default AddTransection;
